name: ProcessResult

methods.name: getEntityId
methods.description: The ID of the record being processed.

methods.name: getErrors
methods.description: If an error occurred, returns an array of one or more database error objects including the error code and description.

methods.name: getInstanceId
methods.description: The ID of the approval process that has been submitted for approval.

methods.name: getInstanceStatus
methods.description: The status of the current approval process. Valid values are: Approved, Rejected, Removed or Pending.

methods.name: getNewWorkitemIds
methods.description: The IDs of the new items submitted to the approval process. There can be 0 or 1 approval processes.

methods.name: isSuccess
methods.description: A Boolean value that is set to true if the approval process completed successfully; otherwise, it is set to false.

description: After you submit a record for approval, use the ProcessResult class to process the results of an approval process.
